# sentenceRange(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the range of a sentence containing the specified range.

## Declaration

```swift
func sentenceRange(for range: NSRange) -> NSRange
```

## Parameters

- **range**: The character range.

## Return Value

Returns the range of the sentence.

## Discussion

This is a convenience method for calling [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLinguisticTagger/tokenRange(at:unit:)], passing the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLinguisticTaggerUnit/sentence] unit and the first position of the provided range.

## Determining the Range of a Unit Token

- **tokenRange(at:unit:)**: Returns the range of the linguistic unit containing the specified character index.
